abstract: Relational Investors, the activist investment firm run by Ralph V. Whitworth, says that “Elliott’s suggestions for unlocking value are similar to our recommendations.”
snippet: Relational Investors, the activist investment firm run by Ralph V. Whitworth, says that “Elliott’s suggestions for unlocking value are similar to our recommendations.”
lead_paragraph: A big investor in the energy company Hess Corporation said on Wednesday that it supported the changes called for by the hedge fund Elliott Management.

headline.main: Big Investor Supports Elliott Push for Shake-Up at Hess
